programme.sub-title: Son, Forgive Me for My Drug Addiction

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Get Out of My Face & Unlock Your Phone; My Son Is Albino & No One Believes Me
programme.desc: A DNA mystery more than four decades old may get solved as Solomon learns whether Ricky is his father; Avione says her friendship with Julie has turned from clingy to obsessive.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: 21-Year-Old DNA Mystery; Unlock My Three Phones
programme.desc: Amber learned about her potential father's identity when she turned 16, and Karamo hopes to put her search to a halt with a paternity test; Bernadette is fed up with her girlfriend's incessant accusations of flirting and sleeping with men.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Are You Sleeping With Your Bff?! / Unlock: Stop Getting Others Pregnant
programme.desc: Patrick suspects La Joy of cheating with her best friend Tony, but she denies it. Karamo investigates. Meanwhile, Airreyonna doubts her on-and-off boyfriend Teair, who admits to past betrayals.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Dad's Girlfriend Is My Age / Unlock: 10 Years Of Lying & Cheating
programme.desc: Today on Karamo, Kalysta is 19 years old and believes that her father, Robert, is being used by his 20-year-old girlfriend, Lee. Then, Matt believes that his wife, Amanda, is a liar and has ironclad evidence that she’s cheating.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Have Your 6 Kids, Why Are You With Her?/ Mom, You Don’t Respect Us!
programme.desc: Mandy believes she’s become the other woman. She’s at home raising their children while he’s having an affair.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Prove You’re Not Cheating
programme.desc: Ariana and fiancé Richard's future was paused when her friend uncovered a variety of dating apps on his phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You My Cousin Or My Father
programme.desc: At first, Neshay thought Michael was her cousin, but it turns out that he could possibly be her father.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 3 Men Tested…Which One of Them is my Baby's Father
programme.desc: 24 year old Melissa claims 47 year old Rob fathered her baby, but Rob’s daughter wants proof!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Know You Cheated on Me with Your Brother...Test them Both!
programme.desc: Tontalana married hotel chef Travis, but suspects he’s having sex with hotel guests! Then, is Latrenda having sex with her brother Seth? Plus, Tiffany ended her engagement to Charles because his exes keep harassing her! Is he done with his exes?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Got Me Pregnant at 13 … I'll prove You're The Dad
programme.desc: She says her baby is denied becacause the child was born with a major medical problem. Keith's new girlfriend also denies the baby. Then, Irene's love for Lupy turns to hate when he denied her baby, but her mother hated him from the start.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Don't Have 9 Kids ... The DNA Will Prove It!
programme.desc: Diana, Mark and Mark's mother Desiree are here to see if Mark's the father of Diana's baby. But when the results are revealed, will Desiree go on the warpath? Then, Shane swears he's not the father of Christina's baby.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Who's MY Baby's Dad…My Husband or His Nephew?
programme.desc: MAURY has more unbelievable paternity test results today - including a woman who is desperate to prove that the man she brought to the show is the father of her triplets.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Praying My Twin Brother Is Not Your Baby's Father!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY ... Cecil is trapped between Raven, the woman he loves, and Cecile his twin sister. Raven swears he's the father of her child, but Cecile is dead set on convincing him that he's not. He doesn't know who to believe and just wants a paternity test to solve this DNA mystery once and for all. But will the results have Cecile eating her words? Then, Both Tony and his new girlfriend deny that he's the father of Shannon's kids. But Shannon says that the proof is in the feetl Will Tony's toes predict the paternity results? Find out on today's MAURYI

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Family Secrets...Are You Cheating With My Sister?
programme.desc: These cheating lovers have hidden their lies in the shadows for too long. Now we're bringing the truth to light. These women are desperate to find out if their men are really cheating on them. But they do nothing but deny, deny, deny. Maury's team of experts have the lie detector results that will reveal the truth once and for all.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My Sister Sleeps Around…Give Your Baby A DNA Test!
programme.desc: Two years ago Chelsea was cheating on her boyfriend with his friend, and now needs to know who's the father.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Teen Daughter Having An Affair With the Man I Love?
programme.desc: John’s wife Ingrid says there’s no reason to own 3 cell phones unless he’s using them to cheat! Tina’s fiancé is already married to another woman, but did he cheat with a neighbor too? Is Lisa’s boyfriend cheating on her with her teen daughter?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Can't Make Girls... Your Daughter Isn't Mine!
programme.desc: Mickiela and Ardis both claim that Donavan fathered their kids. Then, Alicia says that her ex Tommy fathered her son, but he’s here with his girlfriend Brandi to prove her wrong! Will Maury say “You ARE” the father?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Was in a Coma ... I Can't Be Your Baby's Father
programme.desc: James was shot and needed help, Mireya took care of his every need and nursed him back to health. Now, James denies Mireya's baby and claims he was in a coma when Mireya got pregnant.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Stole My $2,400 And Spent It At A Strip Club!
programme.desc: After meeting online and moving in together, Katherine is suing Michael for stealing money for a strip club.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Making a Lot of Noise
programme.desc: Hasani and Toni say they bought a very large speaker from the defendant, Armando, with the understanding they’d get their money. Back if they couldn’t find a truck to transport it - which ended up happening. They claim the Armando gave them some cockamamie story that a man showed up to pick it up for them. Armando says the plaintiffs said they’d be sending someone to pick it up. That same day a tall guy came with the same receipt and picked up the speaker. Then he gets a call from the bank saying the charge is being disputed. He claims this is an absurd shakedown and he is accused of making a lot of noise.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You Stabbed Me; DNA: I'm Not Daddy's Sexy Baby
programme.desc: Renee refuses to marry Obediah until he can prove that he's not messing around with his ex; Jason says that Carolyn is his daughter, but his questionable behavior has caused her to have doubts.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Give the Key Back!; Unlock: Broken Phone & Promises
programme.desc: Jackie Juicy's ex has the keys to her house, and her current fiancé isn't happy about it; Servilla thinks her boyfriend, I'Sun, is spending too much time trying to meet and sexting women instead of paying off the engagement ring he put on layaway.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Shocking Confessions
programme.desc: G-money suspects his girlfriend Jordan is hooking up with Khye. To prove otherwise, he demands their phones be unlocked and for Khye to be cut out of Jordan's life for good.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Truth: He's A Jailbird / Unlock: 14 Years Of Marriage Lies? (new)
programme.desc: Samonia wants to mend her friendship with Leslie after criticizing her partners. Meanwhile, Kalondra left her husband Anthony due to lies, but he’s trying to win her back. Karamo helps by unlocking both their phones to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: My Man And Bestie Together? / Unlock: "Nothing Worth Coming Home For"
programme.desc: Much to Malaysia’s dismay, her boyfriend routinely talks to other women on social media. Then, Keiana is constantly fighting with her boyfriend about his cheating ways. He admits to his cheating ways in the past but claims he's an all true man now.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: 17 Years Without My Mother & Father
programme.desc: On Karamo, Tyrill is a 17 year old who never knew who his father is. But today, Tyrill gets to meet a man named Steven, which is presumed to be his father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Died in Front of Me / Unlock The Phone: Where Were You?
programme.desc: Lynn claims that his wife Val seems to want to go out with her sister Mary to party more than be his wife.
